name: nativescript-search-view
description: A customed Search View NativeScript plugin.

scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd demo && npm i && cd .. && npm run plugin.link
scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd demo && npm link nativescript-search-view && cd ..
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.all.android: cd demo/ && npm remove nativescript-search-view && npm install && cd .. && npm run demo.android
scripts.all.ios: cd demo/ && npm remove nativescript-search-view && npm install && cd .. && npm run demo.ios
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build; cd demo;tns plugin add ..
scripts.plu.android: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns run android
scripts.plu.ios: npm run preparedemo; cd demo; tns run ios
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run tsc && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-search-view && tns plugin add ..
scripts.clean: cd demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd .. && rimraf node_modules && npm run plugin.link
